vehicles.description: White vehicle ahead on the same lane, approximately 50 meters away, moving in the same direction
vehicles.explanation: The vehicle's presence and speed will influence the ego car's following distance and speed adjustments.

vehicles.description: Several cars are observed further down the road, implying a populated and possibly busy traffic environment.
vehicles.explanation: The presence of multiple cars suggests the potential for sudden stops, vehicles pulling out, and pedestrians between cars.

vulnerable_road_users.description: A pedestrian with a dog is walking on the left side of the road in the same direction as the ego vehicle.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: Pedestrians walking close to the roadside, especially with pets, can be unpredictable and may enter the roadway unexpectedly.

barriers.description: There is a metal barrier on the left, separating the road from an adjacent water body.
barriers.explanation: The barrier restricts road width and prevents vehicles from leaving the road, necessitating careful driving alongside.
